abstract: At a time when many consumers are drinking tap water rather than bottled water, a high-end chocolatier is making over its marketing to better fit in with the new mood.
snippet: At a time when many consumers are drinking tap water rather than bottled water, a high-end chocolatier is making over its marketing to better fit in with the new mood.
lead_paragraph: At a time when many consumers are drinking tap water rather than bottled water, shopping at Wal-Mart rather than department stores and eating in rather than dining out, a high-end chocolatier is making over its marketing to better fit in with the new mood.

headline.main: Godiva Rides in a New Direction
headline.print_headline: Godiva Rides in a New Direction
